nodes.text: The R0-M3 Droid was a model of humanoid droid used by the Hutt Cartel on the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. A number of R0-M3 units were among the dozens of droids that malfunctioned in the Network Security District and went on a rampage.
Malfunctioning Hutt R0-M3 Droids appears as enemies on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
